item.title: European markets close slightly lower as traders assess simmering geopolitical tensions
item.description: European markets saw a mixed session Wednesday as investors keep an eye on a spike in tensions in the Ukraine-Russia war.

item.title: Stocks fall as Nvidia slumps 2% ahead of earnings report: Live updates
item.description: Stocks dipped on Wednesday as Nvidia slumped 2% ahead of its market moving earnings report, and Wall Street assessed disappointing results from Target...

item.title: FTX co-founder Gary Wang avoids prison time for role in crypto fraud
item.description: Gary Wang was the fifth former FTX executive to be handed a punishment for his role in the collapse of the crypto exchange in late 2022.

item.title: Delta forecasts profit growth thanks to high-end travel and 'resilient economy'
item.description: Delta, the most profitable U.S. airline, expects to expand capacity by no more than 4% year-over-year in 2025.

item.title: Comcast to spin off cable networks as subscribers flee the bundle
item.description: Comcast on Wednesday announced the spinoff of its cable networks, including CNBC, MSNBC and E!.
